name: Blank Stillness
description:
TITLE: Blank Stillness

PLATFORM: HTML

GENRE: Text Adventure Game

RATING: E

TARGET MARKET: Ages 6+, casual gamers

GAME OVERVIEW:

Blank Stillness is a text-based adventure game in which you experience a calm but tense narrative where the player has no memories and finds themselves placed in an empty, white room.

Launch the HTML file
